requests.description:
The Helping Hand (THH) needs two second-hand 14-foot covered lorries with tailgate (auto/manual drive). One of THH work program offers a full service of house moving and we require a fleet of lorries to do this. In March 2026, four of our lorries’ COE will expire and will need to be scrapped. We are looking for two used/ second-hand lorries to replace them. This work is essential to our beneficiaries as it provides them employment during their rehabilitation program with us. The cost of replacing these lorries with new lorries is extremely expensive. We seek your generosity to donate 2 used lorries to us. Thank you.
More information of our Moving Service can be found in our website:
https://thehelpinghand.org.sg/removal-disposal-delivery/

About The Helping Hand: The Helping Hand is a Social Service Agency and Charity affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a halfway house that provides residential drug rehabilitation and reintegration support services to male ex-offenders with a history of drug-related offences. This service is a residential programme conducted in the premise of our organisation, and our premise was graciously provided by the Singapore Government in recognition of our services to the community. Our services are free and none of our residents pay their way in and throughout their stay with us.

requests.description:
A financially stressed family struggling to make ends meet needs is seeking a kind donor to provide an in-ear thermometer. This is mainly to help ascertain and check the body temperature for J, who was born prematured and afflicted with multiple medical conditions. He has undergone various surgeries to correct his internal organs, removal of stoma bag and opening of an anus hole, shift his urinary tract to below his belly button, and opening of a hole in the chest to aid in breathing via a tube. Because of his physical conditions, he is prone and susceptible to infections, requiring immediate medical attention and hospitalisation. Having a thermometer will help the mother be able to more accurately determine if J needs to see a doctor immediately.

Your kind donation will help the mother in a big way to better care for J and ensure his well-being at all times.

offers.name: Foldable Laundry Rack / Drying Rack
offers.description:
The Laundry Drying Rack offers a compact design, straightforward setup, and robust construction, making it ideal for efficient laundry management. Its space-saving slim feature allows it to be folded up against the wall when not in use, perfect for tight spaces. Additionally, the easy installation and solid build quality make it a reliable choice for outdoor or indoor use.

1. Best item for installing in front of windows at indoor such as laundry room, living room.
2. Can save space as it can be folded
3. Doesn’t need to damage your house, no drilling required
4. Easy to install, disjoint by one-touch system
5. Double lock to fix it firmly
5. Wide enough to hang many clothes and blankets
6. Width adjustable steel pipes
7. The high compression spring in the post fixes this rack firmly

Condition: Lightly used 8.5/10
